title: Violet Blooming in Patronage - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Saints
author: 성혜림
description:
A girl who has to save the world, meets a frozen knight.

A love that will never be repeated in history begins.

On the day the brothel burned down, Violet, a kitchen girl

Awakened as a saintess destined to defeat absolute evil.

Avoid the insidious touch of corrupt priests

She chooses to be the King’s sword, the adopted daughter of the Marquis

Because she is a lowly commoner, her family members only treat her with coldness.

Among them, her friendly brother Daniel is her only comfort.

But the moment she was shunned from everyone by the cunning of the nobles,

It wasn’t him who actually reached out

It was the cold and ruthless heir of the Marquis, Esselmond.

“You don’t have to do anything. You just have to stay as it is.”

A delicate little flower, sprouting in chaos.

Romance fantasy of fate, where cruelty and fascination coexist!>
